instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan spin
threads.message:
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>

[B]Issue:[/B]
Fans Spin goes wild

[B]Troubleshoot:[/B]
[LIST=1]
[*]Changed SMC twice.
[*]Checked Thermal sensor (proximity Sensor/fin stack
[*]Checked Current sense resistors
[/LIST]

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Fan spin
threads.message:
Do you mean the machine works, but fan spins at max?
If yes, fan starts at max from first second?
Run HWMonitor and post any strange value.
